apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices beautifully illustrates a couple, with one person having a medium skin tone and the other a medium-dark skin tone, surrounded by a glowing heart. Apple’s characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges give the figures and the heart a warm, inviting appearance with realistic lighting. It’s a tender representation of love, romance, and partnership, perfect for expressing deep affection and connection through messages on Apple devices.
